name: ModernTomato
description:
ModernTomato is a game made by an indie developer turing a MS Paint Jam 2021. Theme was Campbell's Soup by Andy Warhol who was a modern artist that designed famous soup lable. 

Turing the jam i had to create a game using ms paint as a graphics tool to draw my art. I also took 2 challenges of making sonds for the game with my mouth and using only comics sans as a in game font style.

Game is about the tomato who fell out of the soupcan and is now trying to escape from the rising soup level in a modern art styled world. 

Project took me 6 hours in total behind the computer to finish.
